events.name: St Peters Holiday Boutique
events.description:
Join us for a festive holiday boutique featuring local artisans, crafts, and unique gift items. Find perfect gifts while supporting our community!

**Sponsor:** St Peters Church

**Contact:** Cher Na

events.name: St Peters Holiday Boutique
events.description:
Join us for a festive holiday boutique featuring local artisans, crafts, and unique gift items. Find perfect gifts while supporting our community!

**Sponsor:** St Peters Church

**Contact:** Cher Na

events.name: Pacifica Polar Palooza (includes Elf Market)
events.description:
Kick off the holiday season with Pacifica's premier winter celebration! Enjoy Elf Market with local vendors, festive activities, live entertainment, and coastal holiday cheer. Perfect evening for families and friends.

**Sponsor:** Pacifica Parks, Beaches, & Recreation

**Contact:** L Macario, Susana Leslie

events.name: Pacifica Polar Palooza (includes Elf Market)
events.description:
Continue the celebration with a full day of Polar Palooza festivities! Browse Elf Market, enjoy family activities, food vendors, and holiday entertainment throughout the day.

**Sponsor:** Pacifica Parks, Beaches, & Recreation

**Contact:** L Macario, Susana Leslie

events.name: Rockaway Beach Tree Lighting
events.description:
Experience the magic as we light up our coastal Christmas tree at Rockaway Beach! Join the community for this cherished holiday tradition with live music, hot cocoa, and festive cheer by the ocean. Watch the tree illuminate against the Pacific sunset.

**Sponsor:** Pacifica Chamber

**Contact:** Lynn Callo

events.name: Seaside Merchants Second Saturday
events.description:
Shop local and support Pacifica businesses at our monthly Second Saturday event! Discover unique gifts, special deals, and holiday treasures from our seaside merchants. Stroll through West Sharp Park and enjoy the coastal shopping experience.

**Sponsor:** Seaside Merchants Association

events.name: Winter Art Faire
events.description:
Celebrate the season with local art! Browse and purchase original artwork, crafts, and handmade gifts from talented Pacifica artists. Perfect for finding one-of-a-kind holiday presents that support our creative community.

**Sponsor:** Art Guild of Pacifica

**Contact:** Kristina Ayala

events.name: Winter Art Faire
events.description:
Celebrate the season with local art! Browse and purchase original artwork, crafts, and handmade gifts from talented Pacifica artists. Perfect for finding one-of-a-kind holiday presents that support our creative community.

**Sponsor:** Art Guild of Pacifica

**Contact:** Kristina Ayala

events.name: Pacific Pride Holiday Car Parade / Seaside Merchants Evening Hours
events.description:
Watch decorated cars light up the streets in our festive holiday parade! Marvel at creatively lit vehicles cruising through town, then enjoy extended evening shopping hours with local merchants after the parade.

events.name: Merry Manor
events.description:
Experience the magic of the Manor District transformed into a winter wonderland! Stroll through the neighborhood to enjoy spectacular holiday lights, festive decorations, and community celebration. A beloved Pacifica tradition!

**Contact:** Kristina Ayala
